### Exercise 3.27: Assuming txt_size is a function that takes no arguments and returns an int value, which of the following definitions are illegal? Explain why.    unsigned buf_size = 1024;    (a) int ia[buf_size];           //  illegal :  size of the array should be constexpr    (b) int ia[4 * 7 - 14];         //  legal :    constexpr     (c) int ia[txt_size()];         //  legal :    if text_size() is defined as constexpr function otherwise illeagal    (d) char st[11] = "fundamental";//  illegal :  no space for null
